data.content: Handoff capsule (2026-02-19): Implemented auth-failure UX for Scene/Take terminal sessions in commit 48b8dfe (pushed to origin/main). Added src/lib/terminal-failure.ts classifier and tests; terminal panel now shows actionable auth guidance on non-zero exit, emits toast, and keeps errored tabs open for inspection (auto-close only for completed). Validation run: bun run lint -- src/components/terminal-panel.tsx src/lib/terminal-failure.ts src/lib/__tests__/terminal-failure.test.ts; bun run test -- src/lib/__tests__/terminal-failure.test.ts; bun run build.
